#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define llu long long unsigned
#define lld long long
#define ld long
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
lld mul(lld a,lld b)
{
    lld x=1,y=a;
    while(b)
    {
        if(b%2)
        {
            x=x*y;
            x=x%MOD;
        }
        y=y*y;
        y=y%MOD;
     b=b/2;
    }
    return x;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        lld n,m,ans;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
        if(n==1)
            ans=m;
        else if(n==2)
            ans=m*(m-1);
        else
            ans=(m*(m-1))%MOD * (mul(m-2,n-2))%MOD;
        ans=ans%MOD;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
 return 0;
}
